collection.name: Vending Machine of Words
collection.openText: The machine did not dispense soda or snacks, but the most eloquent of sounds.

specialTipSize.specialTip: After working with $0, the agent experienced an increase in all stats regarding Temperance.
The affected agent was found to also have an increased success rate when performing Insight work.
The effect increases with each consecutive usage, up to three times.
If a different agent works with $0, the original agent loses the effect and it cannot be applied again for the rest of the day.
A portion of all energy accumulated by the affected agent is paid to $0.
